meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>eddy</kanji> <kanji>river</kanji> isn't so much a thing as it is a famous place. We're talking about <vocabulary>Yodogawa</vocabulary>. It might be better to look at the reading to learn the meaning. Look up this Osaka Prefecture river if you'd like more info.
readingMnemonic: The reading is 淀 plus 川. Be careful of the rendaku.
